Uses of Class
logic.tile.Tile

  • Packages that use Tile 
    Package Description
    logic
    The logic package contains the relevant items for running an actual game of Jungle.

    • Uses of Tile in logic

      Methods in logic that return Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tile[][] GameBoard.getGameBoard()
      Returns the two dimensional tile array used to represent the board internally.
      Tile GameBoard.getTile(int row, int column)
      Returns the tile at the given row and column indexes.
      Tile Game.getTile(int row, int column)
      Returns the tile at the given row and column indexes.
      Methods in logic that return types with arguments of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> Game.getNextMove(java.util.ArrayList<Piece> movesOfSide)
      Returns the move the computer would make as black.
      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> Game.getNextMoveBlack()
      Returns the move the computer would make as black.
      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> Game.getNextMoveRed()
      Returns the move the computer would make as red.
      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> GameBoard.getValidMoves(int row, int column)
      Given a row and column containing a piece, all of the valid moves are returned in an ArrayList<Tile>.
      java.util.ArrayList<Tile> Game.getValidMoves(int row, int column)
      Given a row and column containing a piece, all of the valid moves are returned in an ArrayList<Tile>.
      Methods in logic with parameters of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameBoard.setGameBoard(Tile[][] gameBoard)
      Sets the game board to the passed in two dimensional array after validation.
      static boolean GameBoard.validateGameBoard(Tile[][] gameBoard)
      This method validates the passed in variable gameBoard.
      Constructors in logic with parameters of type Tile 
      Constructor and Description
      GameBoard(Tile[][] gameBoard)
      Creates a new game board based on a two dimensional array of tiles.
